author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATE BERYL HAS STRENGTHENED  TO AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... ...LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN THE  WINDWARD ISLANDS THIS MORNING...
summary:
...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATE BERYL HAS STRENGTHENED  TO AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... ...LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN THE  WINDWARD ISLANDS THIS MORNING...
 As of 8:00 AM AST Mon Jul 1
 the center of Beryl was located near 12.0, -60.5
 with movement WNW at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 959 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
